TopicTitle: Make a plane thats got a range of around the world and can hold ten people

Articles.Content:
Make a plane thats got a range of around the world and can hold ten people. no stock planes you have to make it from scratch

also you don't have to land on the runway but land close enough to it that you can see the buildings. You have to be able to go mach 2 not in a dive but when your gaining no altitude or gaining altitude. The winner is the person who makes the cheapest plane. Have fun:D.
You need to show evidence that it can be done.

I made a Plane that I think can go around the world with ten people I'm working on it now.

P.S I like your military company Commander Jebidiah.
I think i'll give up on this thread I wrote all wrong and I didn't specify enough.
